version_description:
Thanks for using ProWriting! Here's what's new:

- Performance and stability improvements.

Do you like the app? Please rate us! We'd greatly appreciate it. You can also contact us at support if you have any questions or comments.

Enjoy and happy writing!

Welcome to Version 2.0!
Thank you for your feedback and support. Please make sure to update the app to get the latest features. The app is called "Proofreader" now! Here’s what’s new:
- Better grammar corrections in the PRO version.
- The correction area fills the bottom part of the Corrector.
- Increasing the character limit in the Corrector to 7000.
- Enhancements on iOS 14.
- New support email.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Please leave a quick review if you find the app helpful. Thanks!

Enjoy and happy writing!

- Performance and stability improvements.

Do you find the app useful? Please leave a review!
Contact support for any questions or comments at help@elearninglab.app
